ru: Вытяните поднятую ногу назад и вверх.
Опустите оба локтя на коврик.
Разогните опорную ногу.
Эка п+ада +адха мукхо шван+асана на локтях.
Собака мордой вниз на одной ноге на локтях.
Поднятой пяткой давите вверх.
Выталкивайтесь локтями, чтобы потянуться грудной клеткой к колену опорной ноги.
Направьте внимание на мышцы лица.
en: Shift the attention to the face muscles.
enSynonyms: Focus your awareness on the muscles of your face.
Bring your attention to the facial muscles.
Direct your awareness to the muscles in your face.
Turn your focus to the area around your face.
Guide your attention to the facial region.
Place your awareness on the expressions in your face.
Concentrate on the sensations in your facial muscles.
Shift your focus to the tension or relaxation in your face.
Tune into the movement or stillness in your facial muscles.
Focus your mind on the face and its muscles.

ru: Сохраняя упор в локтях, сделайте отшаг назад стопами.
Отрегулируйте высоту таза, чтобы от макушки до пяток образовалась прямая линия.
en: Adjust the height of your pelvis so that a straight line forms from the crown of your head to your heels.
enSynonyms: Adjust the position of your pelvis to align your body from head to heels.
Set the height of your pelvis to ensure a straight line from your head to your heels.
Align your pelvis so that your body forms a straight line from the crown of your head down to your heels.
Shift the pelvis height to create a straight line from your head to your heels.
Position your pelvis so a straight line runs from the top of your head to your heels.
Adjust your pelvis height so that the body forms a straight line from head to heels.
Lift or lower your pelvis to create a straight line from the crown of your head to your heels.
Set your pelvis in position so your body forms a straight line from head to heel.
Modify the height of your pelvis to ensure your body aligns from head to heels.
Position the pelvis so that from your head to heels forms a straight line.
Correct the height of your pelvis to create a continuous line from the crown of your head to your heels.
Lift your pelvis so that your body forms a straight line from your head down to your heels.
Adjust your pelvis to make sure your body is aligned in a straight line from head to heel.
Shift the pelvis until a straight line from the crown of your head to your heels is formed.
Move your pelvis to create a straight alignment from head to heels.
Alter your pelvis position to form a straight line from head to heels.
Adjust the height of your pelvis to align your body into a straight line from head to heels.
Ensure your pelvis is positioned so that your body forms a continuous line from head to heels.

ru: Таз на весу.
Сделайте отшаг стопами назад, чтобы лоб оказался между локтей.
Выведите в одну линию ребра, таз и туловище так чтобы от пятки до макушки образовалась прямая линия.
en: Align your ribs, pelvis, and torso in one straight line, so that there is a straight line from your heel to the crown of your head.

ru: Макара +Адхо Муха шван+асана с удлиненным рычагом.
Поза планки дельфина с удлиненным рычагом.
На вдох опустите колени, носки вытяните.
Таз переместите на пятки.
Кисти протяните вперед на ширине плечевых суставов.
Опустите лоб.
+Ардха курм+асана.
Поза получерепахи.
Раскройте грудную клетку.

ru: Удлиняйте дыхание.
